user_query: brother, Harold The heroine of Elemental, Ember Lumen, instead of the name AMBER, which is usually attached to a woman's name, It uses the name EMBER, which means fire left by firewood or charcoal, and the surname Lumen uses the Latin word LUMEN, which means light. He's a character who fits exactly what Peter Sohn said, "I think of courage, I think of courage, I think of courage, I think of courage," and he has a fiery tendency to blow away everything when he's angry Ember is also the most productive character in the production, and she's always got to work on the lights, so the production team developed their own options for transparency, size, and brightness Jean-Claude Kalash, director of filming and lighting, tried to express Ember's emotional line as the intensity of the fire, saying, "The intensity of the fire had to be adjusted so that it wasn't too severe when Ember was angry and lowered the intensity of the fire for details." Also, Ember doesn't appear only in red, but also moves as it changes to purple, so she is the most visual character in the production team, and Ember is the most popular character among animators because she shows a variety of emotions Peter Sohn said that the hardest line to write in the film was the xenophobic story of Ember and her father, Bernie, and that he also suffered from it At the beginning of the movie, Ember showed a negative side of the city when Clod asked her to go to the city, saying, "All I need is in this town, and the city is

entities.entity_description: Elemental은 불, 물 등 원소들이 살아가는 도시를 배경으로 한 애니메이션 영화이다
Ember Lumen은 Elemental의 여주인공으로, 이름은 불씨를 뜻하는 EMBER와 빛을 뜻하는 라틴어 LUMEN을 사용한다. 화가 나면 모든 것을 날려버리는 불같은 성향을 가지고 있으며, 빨간색뿐만 아니라 보라색으로도 변하는 등 다양한 감정을 보여주는 캐릭터이다
Bernie는 Ember의 아버지로, 영화에서 Ember와의 외국인 혐오 관련 스토리가 다뤄진다
Clod는 Elemental에 등장하는 캐릭터로, Ember에게 도시로 가자고 제안한다
Peter Sohn은 Elemental의 감독으로, Ember 캐릭터에 대해 "용기"를 떠올린다고 말했으며, 영화에서 가장 쓰기 어려웠던 대사가 Ember와 아버지 Bernie의 외국인 혐오 이야기였다고 밝혔다
Jean-Claude Kalash는 Elemental의 촬영 및 조명 감독으로, Ember의 감정선을 불의 강도로 표현하려고 노력했다

relationships.relationship_description: Peter Sohn은 Ember 캐릭터의 용기에 대해 언급하고 캐릭터 개발에 참여했다
Jean-Claude Kalash는 Elemental의 촬영 및 조명 감독이다
Jean-Claude Kalash는 Ember의 감정선을 불의 강도로 표현하는 작업을 담당했다
